purpose: Academic working paper on inflation measurement methodology, alternative measures, and the democratization of economic knowledge through AI. Fuse economics with sociological and philosophical work to tell a story about capabilities increases that can have human impact. Forecast societal level implications and impacts taking history into account.
audience: Academic researchers, policy analysts, and informed readers interested in economic measurement and AI capabilities
constraints: All factual claims must be supportable
Quantitative support for claims should be included where possible
Bombastic claims are ok if they have high impact and get the reader involved
